author: Symeon White
description: Passion fruit and Galliano influence this Bacardi Cocktail style drink.
name: Don's Passion
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out flesh and seeds into shaker
Add next 4 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
Pour grenadine into centre of drink (should sink to bottom)
